website_summaries.verdict: One of the cheaper options available for customers who want to save some money.
pros: Velcro straps embroidered with attractive, reflective design
Easy to put boots on paws with expanding shoe tongue
cons: Some issues with durability of straps

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfectly on my 22lbs maltipoo, I ordered size two which I roughly guessed on. We had an incident where the recent cold weather/salt did not go well with his paws. I will no longer have to worry about his paws being torn up due to weather. The inside is very soft, its sort of furry. This is my pet's first pair of shoes EVER. He was of course walking funny at first but went on his first walk after which made him a pro. My only con is that you can see where glue was used which I don't really care as long as comfort is there.
customer_reviews.author: N Segovia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first experience with boots and my pooch was very unsure about them when we first put them on. As we ventured on our walk, she soon forgot about them. The double strap design was instrumental in the boots staying on for two miles through deep snow and much to my surprise, her paws were COMPLETELY dry after taking them off! I would highly recommend these dog boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boot purchase for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 8 for my 3 yr old German Shepherd who weights 88lbs. They fit great, super easy to get on and have 2 velcro straps at the top to fit the boot snug around the leg so it won't come off. We are from California transfered to Pennsylvania and I was worried about the large salt chunks they put everywhere cutting his paws and I wanted to continue the long walks without fear of damage to his feet or injury due to slipping. It took about 5 minutes for him to get comfortable at first use but after that he was running and playing like normal. Great product at a great price. I would recommend these boots to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dogs paws about 15 times before I was certain about the size, and it paid off. These boots fit as expected, the Velcro is very sturdy, and the soles are durable. If you are having your dogs wear these on a longer hike, PLEASE buy them some baby socks. After a while, the dogs' paws begin to sweat and the boots chafe the more sensitive areas. When they wear socks, their feet may become hotter, but there is no chafing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are pretty good, especially for the price! Each dog will be different but I only really have two complaints. In order for the boots not to slide off they have to be cinched down quite a bit and I’ve noticed after some hikes my dogs see claw pad is a little rubbed and tender. The other is that the Velcro’s straps are a little longer than they really need to be which makes them much easier to unvelcro. Overall they’ve held up well to snowshoe holes, groomed snow trail hikes, walks in rain and mud and many other walks we could think to challenge them to. They seem to actually be waterproof which is a huge plus
customer_reviews.author: serwin03

customer_reviews.title: Great help with slipping on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: My ancient Great Dane has a horrible time on my hardwood floors. She looks like she is on ice skates—slipping or being fretful getting off the couch. I have purchased other anti-slip socks and they fall off almost immediately. These boots rock. I have them on her rear paws and she’s walking so much better. Her back paws are 2 different sizes as she is missing a whole toe on one side but the Size 8s are fine for both feet. Love these. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J Rob

customer_reviews.title: They actually stay on!
customer_reviews.text: The double velcro straps definitely help these fit nice and snug. My dog would pull off other shoes but not these ones! They open wide so it's easy to fit my dog's paws in. He still has his dewclaws on his hind legs and i'm able to easy put these on and take them off without causing him any discomfort and without catching on the dewclaw (other shoes I tried sat right on his dewclaw and I could tell he didn't like them). For reference I have a Saluki who weighs 35 pounds and the Medium/Large size works perfectly for him.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: stays on well, could be taller
customer_reviews.text: Updated after more experience: Purchased size 7 for large Labrador mix to protect bandage on foot in ice/snow outdoor conditions.. Tight fit, but should be OK once bandage is removed. Nice features are two Velcro securing straps and pleated expansion to ease putting on and off. Bottom grip on ice is good. Would like to have these extend higher up, perhaps another inch, with appropriate securing strap to better keep snow out. After removing bandage and more experience: inside material does take up moisture, needs to be dried out between uses. Without bump of bandage, slips off more easily while walking - so taller material with higher strap would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: RTSki

customer_reviews.title: Great dog boots!
customer_reviews.text: These little boots are amazing! Ordered a size 3 for my 25lb mix breed; She walked funny for a few seconds, but quickly forgot she was wearing them. She wore them in the forest on some rocky terrain and they held up great. They stayed on securely with no issues. Her paws were protected, and the boots didn't hinder her movement. She was able to run, leap, and even dig with her bootsies on. She managed to step on a prickly pear cactus at one point, I was so worried that her paws were injured, but the needles didn't go through the boots! So happy she was wearing them! We love these, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CMack

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and durable boots
customer_reviews.text: We had these boots for our lab that had developed spinal neuropathy, which caused her to drag her feet so badly she bled from dragging her back feet through to the quick. These boots allowed her go for walks for a few more weeks before she succumbed to the disease. They are sturdy and durable boots. We only used two on the back as it caused trouble for her to walk with all four. If you do use these for your dog, let them get used to them for short periods of time as they would be a bit cumbersome for the wearer....however, they save their feet!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Just not going to work for my Frenchie (but size 4 fit perfectly!)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hilarious. He actually did a handstand, leaning forward and sticking both rear legs in the air. Refused to even move, just stood still. Wouldn't come when called, wouldn't move toward door when "walkees" was mentioned. Every time I'd try to adjust one boot, he'd be tearing another off. I've never laughed harder in my life, and my daughter and I will share this memory for years. Frenchies are known for being stubborn, and mine is off-scale. Perhaps a golden would just take off and enjoy new found freedom, wearing these. They were easy to put on, but I may lose a finger if I ever try again. (laughing)
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it right!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Easy to put on and they stay on so long as you tighten them right. They're great at keeping my dog's paws dry in snow and rain!!! I've tried 3-4 other kinds and these are hands down the best!
customer_reviews.author: Isis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: This is a hard guess but I guess you can try and measure your dog's foot
customer_reviews.text: So I wanted to leave a review because I have a beagle I assume that I should go with the right size pertaining to that dog weight and measurements so I followed the guide and it was a little off my dog's shoes came in the mail on time but they were a little big however they look good and they feel like they will work out well but the worst Advent big and my beagle is about 25 lb
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: They lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. They fit well. They are easy to put on, take off. I have a sheltie. We walk twice a day for a total of about 2 miles on mostly paved surfaces or grass. No running at all. These boots lasted 2 months before they became useless because of holes and tears on the soles and along the edges of the soles. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MackerelSky

customer_reviews.title: a MUST HAVE for older dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It is almost with tears in my eyes that I write this review. My 13.5 year old pit bull has really been struggling with walking on hardwood floors recently. He often looks so unsettled and uneasy because he's unsure of his footing. I put these shoes on him hoping beyond hope it would help - and my goodness did it help. Troy is walking like he used to. He bounds around outside running as if there isn't a thing wrong. I cannot express how helpful these shoes were.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Warm and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for our dog to get used to walking in these but overall she appreciates being able to not have salt, slush, or snow in her paws. They take a few mins to get on properly but easier than the balloon type booties we previously tried. We bought the size small for our 17 lb mini poodle mix and the Velcro tightens them nicely. When she gets really energetic and runs in the snow, sometimes they fly off but for low key walks in bad weather they are a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey's Mom

customer_reviews.title: They helped our dog, but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our 11yo lab with degenerative myelopathy. I spent a little extra on these because we wanted high quality shoes that would last. Pros: They are sturdy while on, and the double straps help keep them in place. The fit is perfect and they aren’t garish like some we saw. But most importantly, they REALLY helped her keep her balance. Cons: After only five walks, the tread on the pads is worn all the way down. Now we’re concerned that they’re going to wear through on a walk and we’ve only had them a week. Overall, we loved them while they lasted, but they aren’t worth it if we have to buy a new set every week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Our frenchie drags his back legs, these have been a life saver with keeping his back paws from being torn up from rough surfaces. Prior to these he would always have sores when he walked to much.
customer_reviews.author: CountryLiving

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, great booties
customer_reviews.text: Bought this booties for our female Aussie because the synthetic turf in backyard gets hot in the summer and was giving her turf burn. We also do a lot of hiking in the summer months in CA. The booties are great. My only concern is that I wished they went up higher on the legs to cover the top back toenail. We haven’t had the booties too long so I can’t speak about durability yet. So far the booties seem to be a good fit for her. Our Australian Shepherd is 37 pounds and we ordered her a size L booties. Before you go with a higher end brand give these booties a try.
customer_reviews.author: Ram3063

customer_reviews.title: You’ll get a great laugh but it won’t work for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but it’s only for a good laugh...not sure if you don’t mind paying for it. It won’t stay on if you are going for a walk. I have a Havanese that weighs about 12lbs. When she needs to go for a pee and it’s rainy and muddy out then we put these on and carry her outside to her designated area. Place her down to pee and immediately picking her up and carry her back inside. That’s the only way to keep these booties on and her paws dry. Or u could use balloons and it would be much much cheaper. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Our little corgi rubs her back paws raw running around the pool, so these little booties work out great. I bought the wrong size at first but the return and shipping process was excellent. Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good, wished they were more durable...
customer_reviews.text: I never considered buying shoes for my dog. However when he plays ball, he runs so hard he makes is paws bleed. I paired the shoes with playing ball for a high reward. He does great with them. Sadly, after a few uses, he wore the back ones through. I am sure if these we're used for hiking or regular walking they would hold up. Granted my dog is a beast with his ball and running on cement. It has helped reduce injury, which was my main goal. They turn sometimes and need to be re-adjusted. I wish they were somehow more durable. Overall, Good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Dee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: So super excited to get these as my dog is allergic to pet much everything outside. Get them and I'm not very hopeful. Super stiff, lots of sharp points in the materials inside the shoe and a layer of felt at the bottom is all there is. But I'm thinking well maybe I can get him socks? But the moment I put them on I knew they were going back. Even cinched down tighter than I felt comfortable with they slid right off. Back in the box they go. I honestly don't know how they had so many good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: KC Craig

customer_reviews.title: Lost three out of four boots.
customer_reviews.text: These boots worked great out on the ice when we went ice fishing. My dog was cutting her paws on the sharp snow and ice and the boots eliminated that. But the first time she wore them out in warmer slushy weather she lost a boot. The second time we went out in the woods she lost two more! So we are down to one boot. Found that the hook and loop filled with the slushy snow and would not hold up to her running through the rough. When put on they fit great and there was no way they would come off. But as soon as they got wet with the slushy snow there wasn’t much holding them on.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Benji loves these boots
customer_reviews.text: First ordered the wrong size, no problem exchanging them, great company, Benji knows we are going walking when he sees me getting them out. He lays down and lets me put them on him. He is only 10 months old but loves to walk. The boots have 2 straps with velcro which work very well, although occasionally he may throw one off through no fault of the boot because he runs, jumps, climbs snow drifts and does not slow down because he has these boots on. He loves these boots. Great Purchase
customer_reviews.author: G. Reid

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I really wanted to love these shoes. They look amazing, the rubber is thick and it looks durable. But they are not nonslip, my dog easily takes them off and the straps broke. They are so slippery that my dog tripped and got injured. A tooth fell out from the fall. Honestly for my dog this shoe didnt work. My dog is an old Yorkie, so I cant blame the shoes for her getting hurt so I gave the shoes 5 chances and it failed all. She has tried other shoes and they have been fine, so I don't know why these arent working.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Navarro

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: Took a few tries before our Aussie puppy got used to them, but now he knows that booties on means a big walk! These have been great for protecting our pup from hot concrete and glass on the sidewalks (we live downtown). We've gotten several compliments and inquiries from strangers since they actually stay on our little pup when he's running in the grass. Helps keep our apartment cleaner since we just take off the booties instead of having to wipe off his paws.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Best dog boot ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many different dog shoes and I finally found a winner. My dog blasts out of the house and tears through the yard and these boots stay on. I fasten the Velcro very secure. She wants them off immediately when she comes in but they work. Such a time saver when the yard is wet and muddy. I no longer need to wash her paws in a bowl with soap water ...she comes in and sits down and the boots are removed! Then she can roam through the house without tracking dirt and mud around. Love love love this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Size 6 fit perfect for our lab
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 6 for our 50 lb. Black lab and these are amazing and fit perfect. We had purchased another pair which we returned because they were too bulky and would fly off her feet when she was running. These ones are the perfect balance between rugged and light weight. We took her up in the woods in the snow for an all day hike in 500 acres and didn't have any issue with these. They stayed on tight and didn't slip down like other boots. I am noticing some fraying on the straps where the two velcros touch and rub but I'm not that picky to fault the product for it. I just trimmed it off.
customer_reviews.author: Donald & Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Slip off if not super tight but protective
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are great boots! They kept my dog's feet dry in the snow. They slip off if you don't put them on just right but it's not too bad. They are a bit heavy and took some getting used to but my dog adjusted fairly quickly. They're heavy enough that I could hear them clunking when my dog walked on hard floors or concrete and she's only 38 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Good to know
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Golden retriever. We hike and run trails together. They stay on pretty well, but occasionally one falls off (no issues). The dogs front paws wore a hole just behind the rubber potion pretty fast. All in all a good product just needs a modification so the rubber extends futher back.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable... might need to redesign the shoe *see pics
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are easy to get on and off... and our pup adjusted to them quickly. Just a heads up: they'll need to be washed frequently since your pet's paws will sweat and cause a stinky feet odor. (At least that's what happened with us). Also, keep your pet's nails trimmed! Our booties only lasted about 45 days because his nails busted through the fabric part of the bootie....We already need a replacement pair; so for that reason (cost vs. ROI) I rate them 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all for our Pug.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how other reviewers could give these boots a positive review. They are very difficult to put on, actually we were not successful at all. They are very stiff and upon closer examination they look like they could quite possibly injure your dog. They force the dogs paw/lower part of leg to be straight so it looks like a smaller dog, ours is a pug, could hurt himself if he tried to walk in them. We are returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allison

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As long as I don’t tighten the Velcro to tightly these shoes work great. Phin, my golden, walks on the tips of his nails, which makes the poor pup scared of walking on the hardwood floors. This caused him great anxiety. After trying several boots, these work the best. They don’t slide around on his feet, which is the problem we had with the others. He doesn’t mind at all wearing them. We do take them off when it’s wet outside, and don’t put them back on until his paws are completely dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ExPawlorer Waterproof Dog Boots
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a size 5 for our boxer. They stay on very well . He likes to run very fast in our yard and has only lost a shoe a couple times. Mainly due to us not tightening. I do wish there was more velcour on the bottom strap. And the toe area where his nails are was more reinforced. He has worn a hole in the end of one of them. Perfect for a dog that just needs for daily walks. Expect to buy more if your dog has to use them to run in the yard. We are ordering our second pair 5 months later. I still give 4 stars for staying on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They stay on!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making my dog wearing it for 2 days (taking them off at night) and they are doing great. He can walk and run in my laminate without slipping. He went in and out of the car, walked on grass and asphalt and so far so good. They have stayed on and I think he is liking them. More traction for him inside and no hot ground outside. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bella Lacazotte

customer_reviews.title: Way WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: I got the smallest size available for my 9lb shiranian and they were still too big to be comfortable for her. I also question the design of the shoe, whether it would have stood up to frequent use with a Service Dog.
customer_reviews.author: s34w33d

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Dog eventually loves them
customer_reviews.text: Seem well made and sturdy. Dog goes from that look of shame when we put them on and hilariously prance walking like one of those high stepping horses to not wanting to come back in from the snow and barely being able to stop running around long enough to poop. This cold spell is the first time in 6+ years my golden (who loves plowing through the snow every year) has shown issues with his feet being out on the cold icy snow. They have come off a couple times upon agile moves by the dog, so put them on tightly.
customer_reviews.author: NickB

customer_reviews.title: So happy I chose to get these!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve ever written a review on Amazon. I bought these for my miniature poodle, Charlie. Of course he hated them at first! Soon, he realize that he had a lot of traction in these things and could really takeoff in them! I highly recommend the shoes to anyone looking because they have a hard soul like a regular sneaker. Not only does it keep him from burning his paws on the sidewalk in the hot summer, his paws look healthier since he started wearing them outside. They are much softer and smoother. I hardly have to use Shea butter on them at all anymore! Definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great for snow! They stay put!
customer_reviews.text: They fit excellently on my dog and she almost never kicks them off (it's happened just twice in the month since I started using them). They don't seem to bother her feet at all and she can go for nice long walks without being bothered, and they keep her paws dry and protected from snow and salt. they're easy to clean too when she gets them muddy. Great shoes! Just be sure to measure your dogs paws before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: This boot fits
customer_reviews.text: These booties fit my dogs paws perfectly and don't come off during regular doggie activities. My dog can walk easily in them (no tripping) because they fit so well. They are very easy to get off and on and seem comfortable. I followed the measurement instructions exactly. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and visible, a winning combination
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put on, and with two velcro straps to secure, I haven't had any issues with them falling off my dog's feet. It should be noted, that I did strictly adhere to the measurements for sizing as I am sure this plays a big part. I was skeptical about the visibility of just the reflective stitching, but when light hits it, it makes his feet very noticeable. Have only had them out a handful of days now, so I can't speak to the durability, but I am hopeful on that end. At the price, I feel that a winter or two is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ent

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE AND BOOTS STAY ON !
customer_reviews.text: Molly our ten year old beagle, needed to practice inside with one and then two shoes for a few minutes. Now we can use all four to go out on the deck in the icy weather to do her business. She has moved beyond fear of these boots to short time, protective usage. They are well made and flexible . I’m confident younger dogs could adapt more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Johnson Kwartler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good boots.
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit my dog perfectly. He was able to work them off eventually after about 10 minutes of him pulling at them. We left them on just to see if he could get them off. With normal walking outside the boots were very secure. They have a nice rubber padding and 2 velcro straps to help the boots fit securely. I ordered a size 6 and they fit my English Bulldog perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Bond

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog who was having hind limb problems and dragging his paw. They worked great but the Velcro portion on it was a little loose for my dogs leg, even though the law portion fit, so it had a tendency to turn around on his paw making it hard for him to walk. Sadly he passed away before I could try the smaller size. But it is a great product for outside use!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lagana

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for your dogs feet
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to measure the dog’s feet but when we got the correct size they have worked very well! I don’t know how durable they are bc we have not had them very long but they have been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: They do the job but I envision a better idea for the ankle areas
customer_reviews.text: They do the job but I envision a better idea for the ankle areas. thinking instead of the same technology a very stretchy and tight fitting material almost like a jogger pant. Then still have the straps and these would be highly improved. Overall 4 starts as they keep his paws protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paw Savers!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to take my dogs on a long hike that contained some volcanic scree and sharper rocks. They worked perfect! They stayed in place and fit snuggly around the paws. No issues with them slipping off even when my pups were running or jumping up rocks. The velcro strap fit tightly around their legs to keep out small pebbles. On this hike I saw other dogs that had shredded their lower quality boots and other people that were carrying their dogs down. Our pups' paws looked great after the hike.
customer_reviews.author: chadoutwest

customer_reviews.title: Helped old dog enjoy walking again
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! I ordered these for my 15 year old Lab who tends to drag his back feet due to age and loss of muscle in his hind end. They work great, he now doesn’t injure his feet from dragging and these held up pretty well to constant friction. The leather on top is starting to separate but considering he has been wearing these daily since purchase that’s not bad. He even hops around happily to greet us, which hadn’t been the case before this purchase for fear of injuring his feet. I think he likes them!
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie P

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Velro
customer_reviews.text: I do like that there is the rubber on the bottom, it keeps my dogs feet dry when going through the snow. The one issue with these boots is that I haven't even made it through one winter season with them and the Velcro has completely failed. It does not stick anymore so when she goes in the snow, they fall off and I have to go retrieve them. There is nothing that I can do about it so I will have to buy another pair of booties next year. This was a bummer because I thought they would last significantly longer. If your dog is walking around in the snow with these boots, they will not last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vega

customer_reviews.title: Not great for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The boots look pretty durable for the elements, but overall the sizing was wrong. If you have a thin dog with short hair, I'd size down a bit from what they recommend. I also wish they put something softer on the inside of these boots. The top edges are a tough fabric and begin to rub on the legs after only 10 minutes, and quite irritable to the dog. I'd return them and get something else if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & great investment
customer_reviews.text: These booties were as advertised. They have a good quality sole, sizing was true as listed, stay on and allow for free movement, they stay on his pad and didn’t turn on his foot. My beautiful boy did the awkward stepping on the initial wearing but w/in minutes he started climbing the furniture & playing. I look forward to him using them. The only thing I will say is if you want these order now it took almost 2 weeks to get them.
customer_reviews.author: maria H

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for our pup
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to try these boots out on our Aussie pup! He’s obsessed with basketball, but his paws would end up bleeding after playing on the driveway with our kids. These boots saved his paws, but sadly only lasted for 4 or 5 uses. They have all torn through. Hoping to find something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Robison

customer_reviews.title: Good product but wears fast with regular use
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten countless compliments from passersby when my dog wears these booties. They fit great, and my dog doesn't mind wearing them at all. I'm not sure how durable they're supposed to be, but after about 4 months of pretty regular use, they've worn through the bottom soles, and the velcro straps no longer stick even after cleaning. I probably won't order them again as it's too costly to replace at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: A Doc

customer_reviews.title: Stitching on the inside caused issues
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a solution for my 15 y/o dog slipping on the hardwood floors. These boots were great for that until the stitching on the inside caused my dog bad sores after two weeks. We followed the size guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: ZLRod

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: They fit for the most part. Better than any of the other ones i've ever purchased and they tend to stay up better. However I would not recommend them for long term wear as you do have to crank them down pretty tight to get them to stay. Of course my 12lb chi has very tiny feet so judge for yourself. A well made heavy duty product advertised correctly. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Docholiday

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous boots to protect pups paws!
customer_reviews.text: It's below zero for the first time since getting our pup. First time we went out, I forgot her boots... She was miserable - lifting paws, limping - so sad. Second time with boots on she was running in them! Comfortable and kept her protected! And, when I took them off - dry feet (even though she was in snow higher than the boots)! Very very pleased! Purchased a size 3 for my 13 pound poodle mix!
customer_reviews.author: GB2006

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well. We used them on our dog for a summer road trip hiking at different national parks and got so many compliments!! Plus they really helped when he was walking on rocks. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  but not sure on the build.
customer_reviews.text: They work great, and have pretty much kept my 13 year old lab from slipping on the tile in our house. Exactly what I was looking for. The reason for the 3 star review was on about the 4th day the stitching came off on the velcro and and tangled up in the strap system. I had to cut the thread off to get his shoe off. Of this didn't happen 5 stars for sure. I dont want to send them back because that means my dog will have to do a week without much needed shoes. I'll get him a new pair if these weardown any further.
customer_reviews.author: Plat79

customer_reviews.title: Boots are good but the velcro straps are starting to shred-that is
customer_reviews.text: Boots are good but the velcro straps are starting to shred-that is, the threads that run the length of the strap are separating from the strap.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our little corgi loves them. They make the cutest sound when she walks. Took her a minute to get used to them but she likes them. Have to stay really strict with nail trims now. But we have used them serval times on asphalt and dirt trails and they are perfect. She is such an indoor dog and every time we would take her walking her feet would either bleed or the pads would get messed up so now we can take her walking again! The bottoms are nice like real shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CheriRachelle

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOU HAVE THE RIGHT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I am not thrilled with the return policy as I was not informed when I began my refund process that it was within 30 days. I planned on returning the product because it did not properly fit my dog although the sizing said medium would work for him. They were much too big and caused him pain (strange, I know, but his legs are short, so the boots went over his knees, so he could not walk properly).
customer_reviews.author: Diane Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Constructed Well But Were too Short
customer_reviews.text: Measured our terrier's feet and then purchased based on the sizing guide. Ended up returning as the boot only covered 1/2 of the length of his paw. The boots seemed well made - wished they would have fit our boy!
customer_reviews.author: Scots-Irish Lass (terri)

customer_reviews.title: They Stay On!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my service dog. She goes everywhere with me and Her feet need to be protected from hot pavement. These actually stay on! I'm guessing the two rows of Velcro make the difference. I had purchased others or my senior service dog and he would always get them off as fast as I could put them on. I'm very satisied with these and will buy more when she wears these out.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Not great for Great Danes
customer_reviews.text: I have a 145lb Great Dane. I got the biggest size. They are a little small. But they work for his short walks. This is the first pair that hasn't fallen apart after a couple walks. He has some issues with his back legs. He drags them sometimes. These held up great. Would not be something I could use for long times due to size.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in hopes they'd be able to give my senior dog more traction on the hardwood floors. They made a huge difference almost immediately. The added bonus is they protect his feet in the cold and snow. He will only wear the two on his back feet, but his steadiness is much improved. I would recommend this for all pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: sunny_rae

customer_reviews.title: My 13.5 yr old German Shepherd slips so I like these boots for the vets office, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I love these grippy boots! They are the best. Soft inside .. they sometimes will turn so I have to adjust but I rave about these grippy boots to everyone. I'll put them on when she does a lot of walking so her nails don't trim off to where they will bleed. Thanks for making a good rugged dog shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: GSD_Lover_NY

customer_reviews.title: Stays on
customer_reviews.text: These are the first pair of dog boots that we’ve gotten to stay on our super hyper active dog. They’re also super easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Jesicca

customer_reviews.title: Cute puppy in boots alert!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little dude was incredibly displeased that his mom made him wear these but once he got used to them, and I learned to attach them securely, he seems to be just fine... They seem well constructed and they fit well, cross fingers they last and protect dude in this wicked New Mexico summer heat!! He is approx 30ish pounds and wearing a size 3!
customer_reviews.author: Ava plakio

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots with good tread
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots with good tread. Inside they are lightly felt lined, I bought them for use on hot pavement. Male Standard Poodle 74 lbs and 27” at withers and 2.5 p a width took a size 6 and female Standard Poodle 68 lbs and 24” at the withers with a 2” paw took a size 5. Both fit very well. It didn’t take too long for them to get used to them. I started having them wear the boots in the back yard walking around for 15 minutes each day till they became used to them
customer_reviews.author: On line shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Expawlor dog boots are great quality, they are waterproof, reflective, all good features. I purchased them for my old golden retriever, to help her get up without slipping on the floor, and for that they work perfectly! However when she is laying down they spin, and become upsidedown, so I have to keep spinning them back. I don't want to tighten the velcro so much that she loses circulation. Any suggestions to keep them from spinning?
customer_reviews.author: C. Rosenbach

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the hot pavement in Phoenix. My dog was a little hesitant to walk in them at first but soon got used to wearing them. The protected his feet and stayed on well. I really like the rubberized bottoms to prevent slipping. I also used them when we were traveling in Oklahoma as they have terrible burrs in the grass there. They look really cute on too.
customer_reviews.author: rjsbabe

customer_reviews.title: Good for when the floor is too hot!
customer_reviews.text: These work well for when the sidewalk and asphalt are just too hot to walk our puppy. They seem to want to come off a little bit but if you put em on tight but not too tight, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: We are in the desert hiking on rocks and around cactus needles. His last pair (not yours) would slip and had to be put on again. The true love booties have the perfect fit, follow the chart for size, double straps and great sole. We never had to readjust them during the hike. They were very comfortable for him. He had them on for 5 hours. I would highly recommend them. He is a terrier mix and weights 28 pounds. They are a great find for your dog!!
customer_reviews.author: timothy j kral

customer_reviews.title: Good for heavy weather
customer_reviews.text: I like them and think they’re cute, but my dog hates them. The bottom is solid, which should be a good thing, but it causes them to twist/rotate on his paws sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: miah b

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love them! They are super easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my german shepherd and my husband refuse to buy any other type of boots for her, as they other ones purchase over the years were junk and feel off all the time. I decided to take a chance on these. We absolutely love them! They are super easy to put on. Our dog is proud to wear them and they stay on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Booties
customer_reviews.text: They are relatively easy to put on our dog, which is nice. The double strap helps too but a couple times one or two have come off, could be our fault? They rubber soles but they're extremely slippery for our dog on any kind of ice or very packed snow. I think once the rubber gets cold (MN, extremely cold!) they freeze & turn into a hard plastic which makes them very slippery on certain surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: tk6

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, was anxious to try these out on our furry pet but they kept falling off, even though we did measure as accurately as per the instructions. They look durable, but sadly they just will not work and we did need them to protect her paws from getting twigs and tiny pebbles etc stuck in them. Wish it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Le

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots. The soles are sturdy and seem like ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots. The soles are sturdy and seem like they'll hold up much better than the normal brand I buy..The only problem is that the straps seem to shred along the edges. But I still would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for protection from salt/ice/snow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. My neighborhood doesn't use pet friendly salt, and combined with -20 temperatures my dog refused to put her paws on the ground and was miserable and limping so I had to carry her home from a walk. These have been amazing and are easy to put on. Be sure to secure them tight, especially in the back so snow doesn't get in. I have a medium sized husky mix and got a size 4 and they are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Angela N Accurso

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever, not going to lie but they are way better than ruffwears. I have both pairs and my dog is most comfortable in these, and they stay on! I took her for a hike in the mud and the shoes didn’t get stuck in it. I took her to the beach and she dug and dug and dug for 30 mins and they never came off. I can even put socks in the shoes and my baby is still comfortable. I definitely would buy again, and again. I’m actually on here so I can buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jadeitup

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my pup. I wanted so bad to have this work because we go hiking and on trips a lot and I wanted to protect her paws but unfortunately they fell off every time. They seem like great quality and durability but like I said, she would flick them off almost immediately. They fit her perfectly so I don’t know if changing the size would change anything. She just doesn’t like them as I’m sure most dogs do, until they get used to them but if they don’t stay on then I’m not even going to try to make her get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander stone

customer_reviews.title: Fall Off Easily
customer_reviews.text: My dog got an abrasion on one of his paws. I got these to put one boot on the paw which was scraped. I got the size based on the chart. The problem is the boot falls off within a few minutes of walking. Otherwise the appear to be decently made.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: They fit, stay on, and are great.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various booties over the years and they never, ever stay on my dogs. These are great. They have a nice rubber bottom to protect him from the hot asphalt (we are in the desert) and with eight sizes and specific measuring instructions, they are perfect. Don't go by the breed, do the measurements. They looked small when I first saw them, but they actually fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: tpowers

customer_reviews.title: Great product just too big for my dog. Will reorder!!
customer_reviews.text: These were great & I was so excited, but they were bigger than needed so I had to return. It's getting warm so I will reorder next season! I got a 3 for a rat terrier/chihuahua mix. I probably need a 2 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more cramped paws!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. It takes a minute for the good boy to get used to them but I just wait till we’re basically in the snow before I put them on. For some reason as long as their in the snow and slush the dog will walk and act completely normal. But on dry land, little buddy looks like a baby giraffe. It’s actually Hilarious. Poor boy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: These booties are like human shoes and do not fit well on dog feet. The soles are stiff and not comfortable. the booties are not long enough to be able to secure to dog legs, My dog walked about ten feet and shook them off. she walked with a "slap,slap,slap" with her paws because the soles are not flexible enough to walk normally. In about 10 minutes she was working on shaking her paws in an attempt to get these booties off.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Charette

customer_reviews.title: ... different dog boots/shoes and these are BY FAR the best ones. Really well built
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a few different dog boots/shoes and these are BY FAR the best ones. Really well built, rugged rubber bottoms, and they fit our dogs feet perfectly. The Velcro straps work very well also. You just have to make sure they're on tight enough, otherwise your dog might start to run and lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Heidrich

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Just not a good fit for my Basset Hound. He has large paws and small 'ankles,' and I couldn't get the boot on in a way that was not too loose or too tight.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Very happy that a vet recommended these to us for our old dog on slippery floors
customer_reviews.text: These boots have been great for our 16 year old dog's mobility. He had trouble getting up on wood and tile floors and is doing much better with just the rear boots. The sizing was tricky, and they spin around sometimes but they appear quite comfortable for the dog; using only two at a time allows us to keep a clean pair. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: ordered these boots for my dog because he had cut his foot opened on the crust and ice in the door yard and needed something on his foot to go out side only used the shoe on his injurged foot at first he would not walk on it but after about 5 min. being on his foot he did really good. only used for one week while his foot was heeling. Did a great job. would reckamend to anyone who has dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gammon

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Used these to protect an injured pad on my dogs foot. She's a good sized German Shepherd and purchased a size 8. They seemed to fit but she is very active (even with an injured foo) and these "shoes" just didn't stay in place. They tended to turn backwards; perhaps I should have undersized them. Anyway they served their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: jmt3

customer_reviews.title: BAD VELCRO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the first pair of these at the end of Nov because my dog was having knee surgery and I thought the traction would help with the winter snow/ice. They were great at first - they stay on tight and he does have good traction. Just over 2 months later, I had to purchase another pair because the Velcro completely wore out. I have had the second pair for LESS THAN a month (delivered Feb 9), and the Velcro in THREE of them had completely detached from the bootie, rendering them useless. I am now faced with the choice of buying a third pair in ONE winter season, or walking my dog without.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Presher

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and nake
customer_reviews.text: I think it may run a little small - or I measured a bit off. Anyway, works pretty good! The dog is still getting used to them, but they seem durable and made out of good outdoor material. You have to strap them down pretty tight, but they hold on to the paws decently as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D & Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: They look good but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. Bought 3 days ago size #4 black, but I think size #3 will be ok too. I will buy #3 in a different color Well made . After 4 months shoes have holes, the material is not very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These boots have been great for our dog. They are very durable and stay on his paws. He adjusted to them quickly too so they must be comfortable enough. The only thing that we’ve found is that sometimes they flip around on him. Maybe this would be better with a smaller size but we had already dropped one size down and felt these were a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My name is “Clover” and I live in Las. Vegas. These boots fit perfectly and keep my feet safe from the hot summer asphalt. If you zoom in on the picture you will see I’m wearing these Truelove boots and they are so comfortable I even wear them as I sleep in my truck. Love you fur family and buy these to save their tender toes!!!
customer_reviews.author: King Morty

customer_reviews.title: Help with paw dragging and traction!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dog who has arthritis in her back legs and she tends to drag her back paws. She couldn't be outside for any length of time during the day because she would scrape her feet on the concrete sidewalk. She wears these booties all day and adjusted right away. She's able to be outside and they protect her paws and they give her traction inside on the hardwood floors. The sizing was very accurate and we haven't had any problems with them slipping off!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get these! I needed some booties after last winter when my pup and I got home from the park ,his feet were just shredded from the ice and coldness. These stay on through his "zoomies" and are waterproof for the wet months. Also great for walking in the summer when the ground is too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Paige

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pit from scratching doors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs and didn’t get my Danes measurements right so I need to return 1 pair, but the pair I got for my pittie fit perfect and we have had no scratching of door issues since!!! Win!!!!!!!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Goldstein

product_meta.title: EXPAWLORER Waterproof Dog Boots Reflective Non Slip Pet Booties for Medium Large Dogs Black 4 Pcs
feature_bullets: Size 3: 2.36"x2.05" (L*W) for 20-32 lbs. Great for Sheltie, Mini Schnauzer, Jack Russell Terrier, Cocker Spaniel.
Measurement Instruction: Place and press down the paw on a piece of paper, mark the width and length of the paw and measure the distance. Please follow our video guidance carefully.
Selection Guidance: These size data are boots inside dimensions, and we recommend to choose size according to the width. If your measurement between 2 sizes, please choose the larger one.
Superior Material: Reflective material and skid resistant design provide visibility and safety at night, and waterproof material can keep the paws of your pet dry in rainy day or snowy day.
Comfortable Wearing: Flexible lug design and grooved sole give your dog better control as well as better protection, and the two fasteners straps make the shoes easy to put on and take off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
